citations.narrative:
A Scaly-breasted Lorikeet was found dead in a hole in its primary enclosure wall on 03NOV2025. The wall is fabricated to
look like natural rock face, and holes are present to secure natural branches for perching. This particular hole was too
small for the bird to turn around and got entrapped.
Enclosure design that allows birds to become entangled or entrapped can lead to stress, injury, or death. The staff took
immediate corrective action and blocked all holes of this size with PVC pipe.
The licensee must ensure that primary enclosures are constructed and maintained so that they protect the birds from
injury. To be corrected from this day, December 9, 2025, forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(ii)  Critical
   
Primary enclosures. 
A Scaly-breasted Lorikeet was found dead in a hole in its primary enclosure wall on 03NOV2025. The wall is fabricated to 
look like natural rock face, and holes are present to secure natural branches for perching. This particular hole was too 
small for the bird to turn around and got entrapped. 
 
Enclosure design that allows birds to become entangled or entrapped can lead to stress, injury, or death. The staff took 
immediate corrective action and blocked all holes of this size with PVC pipe. 
 
The licensee must ensure that primary enclosures are constructed and maintained so that they protect the birds from 
injury. To be corrected from this day, December 9, 2025, forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
